Row.Text: All coastal Cities receive a free Harbor. Pay 33% less for Naval Unit maintenance. +1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness from [ICON_CONNECTED] City Connections. Units may cross Mountains, taking 50 HP damage if they end a turn on a Mountain.

[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](DE_DE text) [ENDCOLOR]All coastal Cities receive a free Harbor. Pay 33% less for Naval Unit maintenance. +1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness from [ICON_CONNECTED] City Connections. Units may cross Mountains, taking 50 HP damage if they end a turn on a Mountain.

[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](PL_PL text) [ENDCOLOR]All coastal Cities receive a free Harbor. Pay 33% less for Naval Unit maintenance. +1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness from [ICON_CONNECTED] City Connections. Units may cross Mountains, taking 50 HP damage if they end a turn on a Mountain.

[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](RU_RU text) [ENDCOLOR]All coastal Cities receive a free Harbor. Pay 33% less for Naval Unit maintenance. +1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness from [ICON_CONNECTED] City Connections. Units may cross Mountains, taking 50 HP damage if they end a turn on a Mountain.
